guidesDescription: Learn to fully utilize the features of your dashboard.
guideLocalisationDescription: The location corresponds to the region chosen when creating the container and selecting its deployment mode.
guideObjectsNumberDescription: The number of objects may vary depending on whether options are enabled or not (e.g. versioning, MPU).
guideUsedSpaceDescription: The space used is a value in bytes.
guideEndpointDescription: This information is necessary to retrieve or manipulate your objects via the API.
guideCnameTxtValueDescription: Use the 'Static Hosting' container on a domain or subdomain. Simply modify the DNS zone by adding a CNAME record with this value.
guideVirtualHostedStyleDescription: Expose your containers and objects on the web by setting access rights (per object), giving them public access. They are then accessible via the Virtual Hosted-Style address.
guideObjectLockDescription: Lock your resources to protect them from unexpected deletion or modification, for a defined period or not.
guideVersioningDescription: Keep the history of your objects to find and restore previous versions.
guideTagsDescription: Tag your objects to organize and manage them more easily.
guideAccessLogsDescription: View the access history of your containers to track and analyze their activity.
guideStaticWebsiteDescription: Host your static websites directly from your container for fast and secure delivery.
guideAsyncReplicationDescription: An automatic or manual replication rule has been configured or not on this container.
guideLifecycleDescription: Automatically manage the lifecycle of your objects.
guideDefaultEncryptionDescription: OVHcloud Managed Keys are managed and used on your behalf by an integrated and enhanced KMS service from OVHcloud.
